modShortDescription: Increases the fire rate of the Auto Shotgun to actually feel like an automatic weapon. Increases recoil to balance it.
modDescription:
Increases the fire rate of the Auto Shotgun to actually feel like an automatic [weapon](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/). Increases recoil to balance it. Use with the Full Auto Mod for best effect!

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/saminal1/samsmods-a20/tree/main/SAutoShotgun)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/26324-sams-stuff-all-a20-server-side-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Saminal](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/saminal/)
